snippet: The discovery reported by scientists of a subglacial ecosystem in a lake beneath a half-mile of ice may aid knowledge of how life could survive on other planets.
abstract: Scientists report for first time that they have found bacteria living in lake beneath half-mile of Antarctic ice, discovery that may aid knowledge of how life could survive on other planets.
lead_paragraph: The discovery reported by scientists of a subglacial ecosystem in a lake beneath a half-mile of ice may aid knowledge of how life could survive on other planets.

headline.seo: Bacteria Found Deep Under Antarctic Ice, Scientists Say
headline.main: Scientists Find Life in the Cold and Dark Under Antarctic Ice
headline.print_headline: Bacteria Found Deep Under Ice, Scientists Say, Opening New Antarctic World
